AIInsightReason.name: AIInsightReason
AIInsightReason.description: Represents an Einstein prediction insight reason.

AiInsightValueId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIInsightValue.

Contribution.description: The contribution weight for this insight reason.

FeatureType.description: The type of the feature, such as BOOL.

FeatureValue.description: The value of the feature, such as TRUE or FALSE.

FieldName.description: The name of the field the insight uses for its evaluation.

FieldValue.description: The value for the field the insight uses for its evaluation.

Intensity.description: The intensity weight for this insight reason.

Operator.description: The logical operator the insight uses to compare the field value with the expression value. For example, if the prediction evaluates whether the fieldValue for the field bonus__c is greater than $5,000, the logical operator is greater than.

ReasonLabelKey (Beta).description: The key used to map an Einstein Key Accounts Identification (Beta) insight phrase or phrases to the correct messaging template.

RelatedInsightReasonId (Beta).description: The ID used to relate multiple insights to a single model reason in the Einstein Key Accounts Identification (Beta) feature.

SortOrder (Beta).description: A number value used to organize the phrases in the modelâ€™s insights message in the Einstein Key Accounts Identification (Beta) feature.

Variance.description: The variance weight for this insight reason.
